# nb-3M-01

START
Complete the Naive Bayes classification formula:

y = argmax_c [  x  ]
END

START
y = argmax_c [ P(y = c) x Prod_i P(x_i | y = c) ]

First blank: P(y = c) (prior)
Second blank: Prod_i P(x_i | y = c) (likelihood product)
END
